youtube.archive.header.title: Title
youtube.progress.title: Work in Progress
youtube.progress.p1: We are organizing templates that convert experiment logs into 3–5 minute video scripts.
youtube.progress.p2: We are simplifying thumbnail/title/summary input rules to reduce publishing time.
youtube.progress.p3: We are also preparing a pre-upload checklist (audio, captions, links).
youtube.roadmap.title: Roadmap
youtube.roadmap.p1: Short-term: turn one latest experiment into a weekly video.
youtube.roadmap.p3: Long-term: expand into a series format based on accumulated posts.
